**Filter materials using the *Categories* on the right. Some helpful definitions:** 
:::

- [workshop](#category=workshop): content that can be delivered in a short, 1-2 hour-long session
- [short course](#category=short-course): content that is delivered across multiple (2-5) days
- [course](#category=course): content for a quarter- or semester-long academic course
